name: Squared (Ben Leaver)
description:
A 2d puzzle game where you have to strategically move different types of  squares from the entrance to the exit in a limited number of moves. Made for Mini Jam 80 with the limitation of 8x8 textures. How To Play:

You control the squares and have to get from the start to the exit. Each level you have a team of squares to control (shown at the top of the screen). If you run out of moves (shown in the top left) or all your squares die you have to restart. To win you will have to figure out how each object works. 

Good Luck! 

Controls:

WASD - Move

R - Restart

E - Die

Credits:

-Main game by Ben Leaver

-Music by Adam McCarthy

-Art by my 10 year old sister
